gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Interpolated air quality maps of Belgium

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: Interpolated air quality maps of Belgium

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The air quality monitoring networks in Belgium are used for the assessment of air quality under the air quality directives (2008/50/EC & 2004/107/EC).

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: The air quality monitoring networks in Belgium are used for the assessment of air quality under the air quality directives (2008/50/EC & 2004/107/EC).
De meetnetten luchtkwaliteit in België worden gebruikt om de luchtkwaliteit te beoordelen onder de kaderrichtlijn lucht (2008/50/EC & 2004/107/EC).
contrôle de la qualité de l'air
gestion de la qualité de l'air

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Commission Implementing Decision of 12 December 2011 laying down rules for Directives 2004/107/EC and 2008/50/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards the reciprocal exchange of information and reporting on ambient air quality (2011/850/EU)

gmd:textGroup.gmd:LocalisedCharacterString: Commission Implementing Decision of 12 December 2011 laying down rules for Directives 2004/107/EC and 2008/50/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards the reciprocal exchange of information and reporting on ambient air quality (2011/850/EU)

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: The dataset is created in the context of the 2008/50/EC Framework Directive. The Belgian territory is devided into zones according to the instructions listed in the 2008/50/EC Directive. The assessment methods are used to provide information for the assessment of air quality in Belgium towards the Commission. Member States shall make the information referred to in paragraph 1 available to the Commission for a full calendar year no later than 9 months after the end of each calendar year.
